KMS-Hosting.com provides ddos protected hosting solutions since 2012, including KVM Rootserver, Dedicated Server and Webhosting.

We`re running our own hardware and network infrastructure based on Supermicro / HPE and Dell / Juniper Equipment and have multiple full colocation racks at well-known datacenters, interconnected via leased darkfibers in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. You can lookup our current transits / peerings via http://bgp.he.net/AS30823, looking glass is available under https://lg.combahton.net.

We also offer SSD KVM Rootservers which provide you higher disk I/O. Every Node is connected with 10Gbit in order to avoid bottlenecks in peak usage times and to ensure highest network throughput.

HDD KVM Rootserver starting with Root 1G - 1 CPU Core / 1024MB Ram / 60GB Storage (4,50€ / Month):

-> https://www.kms-hosting.com/rootserver

SSD KVM Rootserver starting with Root 1G - 1 CPU Core / 1024MB Ram / 30GB Storage (4,50€ / Month):

-> https://www.kms-hosting.com/ssd_rootserver

Colocation, Dedicated Servers, Special solutions like BGP Sessions and Remote DDoS Protection (GRE,L2TP,IPSEC via BGP or Static Route) are available too.

If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support by e-Mail (support@kms-hosting.com) and also by ticket (for customers only in our manager). We are available for your questions on lowendtalk too ;-)
